answers.answer: I know my BP is higher when I go after work to the Dr.  just the day to day pressures of my job though.  I don't feel stressed out by it at all.

When i was pregnant with my daughter my bp torwards the end was always higher. Your bottom number is ok its the top # thats high. Are u eating or drinking b4 u go n? Sometimes when i eat b4 going to my apt my bp is higher my heart rate is also faster. I would try and relax bcus stress can increase ur bp also and just wait for ur dr to call u. If it gets too high theres things they can do for u to manage it.
my Doctor called me and he put me on a low dose of blood pressure medicine.... Hopefully this will help!
im sure it will help you :) i have to take blood pressure meds to keep under control im 17 weeks so ill be worried the whole time :)

question: im 30 weeks 4 days along and I had an appoitment yesterday and my blood pressure was high 175 over 90, so I was sent to the hospital to be monitered and for blood work. Preeclampsia and infection were both ruled out, my blood pressure eventually went down so I got to come home. But this morning I had to go back to my doctors office this morning to have my blood pressure checked again and it was 168 over 60. My doctor was in delivery and the nurse told me they would call me tomorrow to let me know what is going on. Has anyone had anything like this happen to them before?
title: what could be going on?
